title: Execute sentencepiece.py to report a error `cannot allocate memory in static TLS block`
body:
<!-- Explain, in a clear and concise way, the command you ran and the result you were trying to achieve.
Example: "I ran `spack find` to list all the installed packages and ..." -->

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install py-sentencepiece
$ cd $sentencepiece.py_dir
$ spack load py-sentencepiece
$ python sentencepiece.py
```

### Error Message

<!-- If Spack reported an error, provide the error message. If it did not report an error but the output appears incorrect, provide the incorrect output. If there was no error message and no output but the result is incorrect, describe how it does not match what you expect. -->
```console
[root@localhost site-packages]# python sentencepiece.py
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "sentencepiece.py", line 18, in swig_import_helper
    return importlib.import_module(mname)
  File "/home/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos8-aarch64/gcc-8.3.1/python-3.8.8-jf6wr2bynimrvwful46fubsy53ikimhv/lib/python3.8/importlib/__init__.py", line 127, in import_module
    return _bootstrap._gcd_import(name[level:], package, level)
  File "<frozen importlib._bootstrap>", line 1014, in _gcd_import
  File "<frozen importlib._bootstrap>", line 991, in _find_and_load
  File "<frozen importlib._bootstrap>", line 975, in _find_and_load_unlocked
  File "<frozen importlib._bootstrap>", line 657, in _load_unlocked
  File "<frozen importlib._bootstrap>", line 556, in module_from_spec
  File "<frozen importlib._bootstrap_external>", line 1101, in create_module
  File "<frozen importlib._bootstrap>", line 219, in _call_with_frames_removed
ImportError: /home/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos8-aarch64/gcc-8.3.1/gperftools-2.9.1-iwl7mtpvkogc3s6p7d45zmbixaccarb5/lib/libtcmalloc_minimal.so.4: cannot allocate memory in static TLS block

During handling of the above exception, another exception occurred:

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "sentencepiece.py", line 21, in <module>
    _sentencepiece = swig_import_helper()
  File "sentencepiece.py", line 20, in swig_import_helper
    return importlib.import_module('_sentencepiece')
  File "/home/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos8-aarch64/gcc-8.3.1/python-3.8.8-jf6wr2bynimrvwful46fubsy53ikimhv/lib/python3.8/importlib/__init__.py", line 127, in import_module
    return _bootstrap._gcd_import(name[level:], package, level)
  File "<frozen importlib._bootstrap>", line 1014, in _gcd_import
  File "<frozen importlib._bootstrap>", line 991, in _find_and_load
  File "<frozen importlib._bootstrap>", line 975, in _find_and_load_unlocked
  File "<frozen importlib._bootstrap>", line 657, in _load_unlocked
  File "<frozen importlib._bootstrap>", line 556, in module_from_spec
  File "<frozen importlib._bootstrap_external>", line 1101, in create_module
  File "<frozen importlib._bootstrap>", line 219, in _call_with_frames_removed
ImportError: /home/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos8-aarch64/gcc-8.3.1/gperftools-2.9.1-iwl7mtpvkogc3s6p7d45zmbixaccarb5/lib/libtcmalloc_minimal.so.4: cannot allocate memory in static TLS block
```

### Information on your system

<!-- Please include the output of `spack debug report` -->

```console
* **Spack:** 0.16.1
* **Python:** 3.6.8
* **Platform:** linux-centos8-aarch64
* **Concretizer:** original
```
